abstract: Author Susan Orlean Op-Ed article examines the reasons behind the waning popularity of the German shepherd; asserts that the demand for the breed encouraged cruel practices that drove its supply, and, as such, a little less popularity is the best thing that can happen.
snippet: The German shepherd’s decline in popularity is good news for its fans, because irresponsible breeding practices will drop as well.
lead_paragraph: The German shepherd’s decline in popularity is good news for its fans, because irresponsible breeding practices will drop as well.

headline.main: Why German Shepherds Have Had Their Day
headline.print_headline: Why German Shepherds Have Had Their Day
headline.seo: One Dog That Has Had Its Day
